comment:
* The SoundTrigger class provides access to the service managing the sound trigger HAL.
 *
 * @hide

variables.name: STATUS_OK
variables.comment: * Status code used when the operation succeeded

variables.name: RECOGNITION_MODE_VOICE_TRIGGER
variables.comment: * Trigger on recognition of a key phrase

variables.name: RECOGNITION_MODE_USER_IDENTIFICATION
variables.comment: * Trigger only if one user is identified

variables.name: RECOGNITION_MODE_USER_AUTHENTICATION
variables.comment: * Trigger only if one user is authenticated

variables.name: RECOGNITION_STATUS_ABORT
variables.comment:
* Recognition aborted (e.g. capture preempted by anotehr use case
     *
     * @hide

variables.name: RECOGNITION_STATUS_GET_STATE_RESPONSE
variables.comment:
* Recognition event was triggered by a getModelState request, not by the
     * DSP.
     *
     * @hide

methods.name: static int handleException(Exception e)
methods.comment:
* Translate an exception thrown from interaction with the underlying service to an error code.
     * Throws a runtime exception for unexpected conditions.
     * @param e The caught exception.
     * @return The error code.
     *
     * @hide

methods.name: public static int listModules(@NonNull ArrayList<ModuleProperties> modules)
methods.comment:
* Returns a list of descriptors for all hardware modules loaded.
     * @param modules A ModuleProperties array where the list will be returned.
     * @return - {@link #STATUS_OK} in case of success
     *         - {@link #STATUS_ERROR} in case of unspecified error
     *         - {@link #STATUS_PERMISSION_DENIED} if the caller does not have system permission
     *         - {@link #STATUS_NO_INIT} if the native service cannot be reached
     *         - {@link #STATUS_BAD_VALUE} if modules is null
     *         - {@link #STATUS_DEAD_OBJECT} if the binder transaction to the native service fails
     *
     * @hide

methods.name: public static SoundTriggerModule attachModule(int moduleId, @NonNull StatusListener listener, @Nullable Handler handler)
methods.comment:
* Get an interface on a hardware module to control sound models and recognition on
     * this module.
     * @param moduleId Sound module system identifier {@link ModuleProperties#mId}. mandatory.
     * @param listener {@link StatusListener} interface. Mandatory.
     * @param handler the Handler that will receive the callabcks. Can be null if default handler
     *                is OK.
     * @return a valid sound module in case of success or null in case of error.
     *
     * @hide

methodNames: public static int listModules(@NonNull ArrayList<ModuleProperties> modules)
public static SoundTriggerModule attachModule(int moduleId, @NonNull StatusListener listener, @Nullable Handler handler)
